comments: The function (1+e)-sigma(n) is defined in A051378. This sequence lists solutions to A051378(n) = 2*n.
mathematica: (* Assuming all terms greater than 28 are multiple of 24 *) ok[n_] := 2*n == Times @@ (1 + Sum[First[#]^s, {s, Divisors[Last[#]]}] & ) /@ FactorInteger[n]; Reap[For[n = 2, n <= 2171581440, n = n + If[n < 48, 1, 24], If[ok[n], Print[n]; Sow[n]]]][[2, 1]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 26 2012 *)
author: _Yasutoshi Kohmoto_
